comment._content:
There aren't any lane lines painted onto the roads. Hopefully they've corrected this by now.

Is this still a one-way road?

comment.author: 24485078@N07
comment._content: Still a one way road.  The area near the top of the picture is being transformed into a TechTown.  I teach in the area.

comment.author: 84613016@N00
comment._content: Look at those historic apartment buildings, long gone razed, just like thousands of them over the last 60 + years. Detroit is but a shell of what it once was, which was a great international city.
